posts.postText: Since early this morning my gmod keeps crashing. It crashes at one of two specific points every time: when loading a map and the status is Sending Client info and when i start up gmod and the status is Initializing Serverside. It is an immediate crash once it gets to those loading statuses.  Halp meh.

I once had a similar problem, to fix it uninstall GMod from steam, then delete this entire folder: C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\[STEAMNAME]\garrysmod
remember that this will delete all your addons, screenshots and Server Downloads
For sending client info, it usually freezes there for a bit for me. Next time wait 5 minutes. If that doesn't work, I don't know.

>> For sending client info, it usually freezes there for a bit for me. Next time wait 5 minutes. If that doesn't work, I don't know. 
Dead & Solved, locked.
